entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Winchester
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:12 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kemptville 2:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

Humidity: 45 %

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow at times heavy beginning late this evening. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
